name: Lightning Flight - Jet Fighters
description:
--- Newly classic STG flattening with IOS7 ---

The most classic gameplay, specifically tailored for mobile phone users.

--- An exciting game ---

※ Simple: Slide your thumb, then you control the whole world!
※ Cool: Hit different enemy with no dull.
※ extremely Challenge: The longer you play, the more excited!

--- You are not alone in the fighting---

In local rankings, you can go beyond yourself. In world ranking, you can transcend all people in the world ...... From now on, you are no longer fighting alone!
